ca.uqac.lif.textidote.render

Class AnsiAdviceRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.AdviceRenderer
      • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.render.AnsiAdviceRenderer

  • public class AnsiAdviceRenderer
extends AdviceRenderer

    Renders a list of advice to a terminal (such as stdin), using colored output.
